  
  
  * No infinite streaming time-out - keep triggering
  0x320062 0x0001 SMbus_32inx_32dat     Write  0x34      * FIRMWARE_CLWR_EZ2CONTROL_STREAMING_TIMEOUT(320062H): 0001  FIRMWARE_CLWR_EZ2CONTROL_STREAMING_TIMEOUT=1

  * Start the core
  * 0x37FE00 0x40002 SMbus_32inx_32dat     Write  0x34      * DSP6_Config_1(37FE00H):  40002  DSP6_CLK_SEL=75MHz to 150MHz, DSP6_RATE=SAMPLE_RATE_1, DSP6_DBG_CLK_ENA=0, DSP6_CORE_ENA=1, DSP6_START=0
